articles.description: Paris St-Germain’s "Ultras" warned Manchester City what awaited them in Paris – but they could not have contemplated the scale of the nightmare that unfolded, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'Guardiola's job at Man City never been bigger'

articles.description: How tough is it to play against a close friend? 'Soulmates' Aryna Sabalenka and Paula Badosa will find out in their Australian Open semi-final on Thursday.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Aryna Sabalenka and Paula Badosa to put friendship aside in semi-final showdown

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text commentary, score updates and match report from Celtic vs Young Boys in the Uefa Champions League.
articles.title: Celtic vs Young Boys: Uefa Champions League stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Arsenal vs Dinamo Zagreb in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Arsenal 3-0 Dynamo Zagreb: Gunners win easily to move closer to last 16 spot

articles.description: England's first T20 under Brendon McCullum ends in a crushing seven-wicket defeat by India in Kolkata.
articles.title: England in India: Brendon McCullum's side thrashed in first T20 of new era

articles.description: Real Madrid become the first football club to generate more than 1bn euros in annual revenue, according to analysis by Deloitte.
articles.title: Deloitte Money League: Real Madrid top, Man City second, Man Utd fourth

articles.description: Bayern Munich's hopes of qualifying directly to the Champions League knockouts are dealt a blow as they lost at Feyenoord.
articles.title: Feyenoord 3-0 Bayern Munich: Dutch side claim impressive victory

articles.description: Teenage forward Lily Murphy stars as Manchester City defeat Manchester United to reach the semi-finals of the Women's League Cup.
articles.title: Women's League Cup: Man City beat Man Utd to reach semi-finals

articles.title: Leeds United v Norwich City: Championship stats & head-to-head

articles.description: This year's Six Nations will use 20-minute red cards for the first time.
articles.title: Six Nations to use 20-minute red cards for first time
